
describe-permissions
********************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Describes the permissions for a specified stack. You must specify at
least one of the two request values.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws opsworks describe-permissions
     [--stack-id <value>]
     [--iam-user-arn <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--stack-id"  (string)
   The stack ID.

"--iam-user-arn"  (string)
   The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the stack AWS Identity and
   Access Management (IAM) role. For more information about IAM ARNs,
   see Using Identifiers .
